channel.description: Hugo Setup Adding a module as a theme Make sure Go is installed go versionCreate a new site hugo new site sitename cd sitenameInitialize your site as a module hugo mod init sitenameConfirm cat go.modAdd the module as a dependency using it’s git link hugo mod get github.com/McShelby/hugo-theme-relearnConfirm cat go.modadd the theme to config.toml # add this line to config.toml and save theme = ["github.com/McShelby/hugo-theme-relearn"]Confirm by viewing site hugo serve # visit browser at http://localhost:1313/ to view siteAdding a new “chapter” page
